[[Image:The Tolkien Calendar 1986 (German).jpg|thumb]]

'''The Tolkien Calendar 1986''' was published in Germany by Hobbit Presse, Ernst Klett Verlag Stuttgart. It features illustrations by [[Dietrich Ebert]] and a unique format of 12 color illustrations each overlaying a calendar page with quotations in German relevant to the artwork.

* ISBN 3-608-95348-5
* Dimensions: 12 5/8 x 15 3/8 inches
* Wire bound; heavy wire hanging loop
